title: Firebase Authentication Success
description: Verify that users (students and teachers) can log in successfully using valid Firebase credentials and receive valid JWT tokens with correct role claims.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid Firebase email and password for a student account
Submit login form
Check that login is successful and JWT token is issued with student role
Repeat for a teacher account
Check that login is successful and JWT token is issued with teacher role

title: Firebase Authentication Failure with Invalid Credentials
description: Verify login fails with invalid credentials and shows appropriate error messages without issuing JWT tokens.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input invalid email and/or password
Submit login form
Verify login is denied with error message and no JWT token is issued

title: Teacher Creates a Batch with Valid Data
description: Verify a teacher can create a new batch with mandatory fields, a unique password, and that the batch is saved in the database and visible in their dashboard.

steps.description: Login as teacher
Navigate to batch creation page
Input valid batch details including batch name, description, and a unique password
Submit batch creation form
Verify batch is created successfully and appears in teacher's batch list
Verify batch password is stored securely and unique

title: Teacher Batch Creation Validation Errors
description: Verify that batch creation fails when mandatory fields are missing or batch password is not unique, showing appropriate error messages.

steps.description: Login as teacher
Navigate to batch creation page
Submit form with missing batch name and/or missing password
Verify validation errors are shown for missing fields
Input batch data with a non-unique password
Submit batch creation form
Verify error is shown for non-unique password

title: Student Joins Batch with Correct Password
description: Verify that a student can join a batch successfully using a correct invite link and batch password, and their membership is recorded in the database.

steps.description: Login as student
Use a valid batch invite link
Input correct batch password
Submit join batch request
Verify student is successfully added to batch member list in database
Verify student dashboard shows the new batch

title: Student Join Batch with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that a student cannot join a batch with an incorrect password and receives an appropriate error message.

steps.description: Login as student
Access batch join page with valid invite link
Input incorrect batch password
Submit join batch request
Verify join request is denied with error message about invalid password
Verify student is not added as batch member in database

title: Student Creates Submission with Text and File
description: Verify that a student can create a submission with text content and attach files within allowed types and sizes, and that the submission is stored and visible in the batch feed.

steps.description: Login as student
Navigate to batch feed for a joined batch
Create a new submission with text content
Attach valid file attachment(s) within allowed size and type
Submit the submission
Verify submission appears in batch feed with correct content and file links
Verify submission data is correctly saved in the database

title: Submission Creation Validation Errors
description: Verify submission creation fails with invalid file types, oversized files, or empty content, showing proper error messages.

steps.description: Login as student
Navigate to batch submission form
Create a submission with unsupported file type
Submit the submission
Verify error message about invalid file type is shown
Attach file exceeding allowed size
Submit the submission
Verify error message about file size is shown
Submit a submission with no text and no file
Verify error message about empty submission content is shown

title: Teacher Reviews and Updates Submission Status
description: Verify that a teacher can accept or reject student submissions and that status changes are reflected in real-time on both teacher and student dashboards.

steps.description: Login as teacher
Navigate to submissions feed of a batch
Select a student submission for review
Update submission status to accepted
Verify status updates appear immediately on teacher dashboard feed
Login as the corresponding student in separate session
Verify real-time notification and updated status reflect on student dashboard
Repeat for rejection status update
Verify rejection status updates similarly reflected real-time

title: Real-time Updates Reliability
description: Verify Socket.IO delivers real-time submission status updates reliably and handles network interruptions gracefully.

steps.description: Login as teacher and student in separate sessions
Teacher updates submission status
Verify status update received immediately by student
Simulate network disconnect and reconnect for student
Verify student receives missed real-time updates upon reconnection

title: Role-Based Dashboard Data Accuracy
description: Verify that teacher and student dashboards display only role-relevant data including batches, submissions, and feeds with correct counts and statuses.

steps.description: Login as teacher
Verify teacher dashboard shows their created batches and associated submissions
Login as student
Verify student dashboard shows only joined batches and their submissions
Check real-time feeds update on both dashboards accordingly

title: Profile Management - Edit and Image Upload Success
description: Verify that students and teachers can successfully update their profile information including uploading profile pictures, with validation and correct persistence.

steps.description: Login as student
Navigate to profile management page
Edit profile fields with valid data
Upload a valid profile picture file
Submit profile updates
Verify profile updates are saved and visible
Repeat test for teacher role

title: Profile Management Validation Errors
description: Verify validation errors occur when profile fields are invalid or file upload fails or contains invalid file types.

steps.description: Login as a user
Navigate to profile page
Input invalid profile data (e.g., invalid email format)
Attempt to upload unsupported file type as profile picture
Submit the form
Verify appropriate validation error messages are displayed

title: Navigation System Responsiveness and Role Restrictions
description: Verify the sidebar navigation adapts correctly on different screen sizes and restricts access to pages/features based on user role.

steps.description: Login as student on desktop viewport
Verify sidebar shows student-appropriate links with correct active page highlighting
Resize window to mobile viewport
Verify sidebar collapses and navigation remains usable and accessible
Attempt to access teacher-only pages directly
Verify access is denied or redirected appropriately

title: API Endpoint Error and Security Handling
description: Verify API routes enforce authentication, role-based access, input validation, rate limiting, and return consistent error responses for invalid requests.

steps.description: Make API request to protected endpoint without JWT token
Verify 401 Unauthorized response with proper error format
Make API request to teacher-only endpoint with student token
Verify 403 Forbidden response
Make API requests with invalid or malformed input
Verify validation errors with status 400 and descriptive messages
Rapidly send multiple API requests to test rate limiting
Verify rate limiting triggers appropriate error response and headers

title: File Upload Handling and Error Recovery
description: Verify profile picture and submission attachment uploads correctly process valid files, provide accessible URLs, and handle storage failures gracefully.

steps.description: Upload valid image file as profile picture
Verify successful upload, accessible image URL, and profile update
Upload valid file as submission attachment
Verify successful file upload and submission creation
Simulate storage backend failure during file upload
Verify appropriate error response and no data inconsistency occurs

title: Explore Feed Search and Filter
description: Verify users can browse public batch submissions in the Explore feed with working search and filter capabilities that return correct results.

steps.description: Login as any user
Navigate to Explore Feed
Use search input with keywords
Verify feed updates to show submissions matching keywords
Apply filters (e.g., by date, batch, or status)
Verify feed updates to reflect selected filters accurately

title: Responsive UI Layout Across Devices
description: Verify that all pages and components render correctly and remain usable on multiple screen sizes from mobile to desktop.

steps.description: Render key pages (Login, Dashboard, Batch Management, Submission Feed) on desktop viewports
Verify proper layout, spacing, and visibility of UI elements
Simulate mobile viewport and render same pages
Verify UI adapts correctly, navigation is accessible, and content is readable without scrolling horizontally
